name: PTA
author: AFNI Team
description: Program for Profile Tracking Analysis - estimates nonlinear trajectories through smoothing splines.

inputs.description: Input data file in table format (data frame structure of long format in R)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Model formulation through multilevel smoothing splines
inputs.name: Model formula

inputs.description: Specify varying smoothing terms. Two components are required: the first one 'var' indicates the variable (e.g., subject) around which the smoothing will vary while the second component specifies the smoothing formulation (e.g., s(age,subject)).
inputs.name: Varying terms formulation

inputs.description: Data table to generate predicted values for graphical illustration
inputs.name: Prediction table

inputs.description: Verbosity level (0 for quiet, 1 or more for talkative)
inputs.name: Verbosity level

inputs.description: Column name designated as the response/outcome variable (default is 'Y')
inputs.name: Response variable

inputs.description: Enable R to save parameters for debugging
inputs.name: Debug Args

output-files.description: Predicted values and their standard errors
output-files.name: Prediction Output
